Klay Thompson thinks he’ll be cleared for full-contact practice around the one-year anniversary of his Nov. 25 Achilles surgery. It then might take the five-time All-Star four to six weeks to regain his conditioning. Whenever he gets on the court, the Golden State Warriors believe Thompson will put them back into title contention.
